Play millions of songs and podcasts, for free.

Why Spotify?

  • Play your favorites.

    Listen to the songs you love, and discover new music and podcasts

  • Playlists made easy.

    We'll help you make playlists. Or enjoy playlists made by music experts.

  • Make it yours.

    Tell us what you like, and we'll recommend music for you.

  • Save mobile data.

    To use less data when you play music, turn on Data Saver in Settings

It's free.

No credit card required.

Frequently Asked Questions

To create a playlist, navigate to the 'Your Library' tab, select 'Playlists', and then click on 'New Playlist'. Give your playlist a name, add a description if you wish, and then start adding songs.

Go to your app settings, find the 'Data Usage' section, and toggle the 'Data Saver' option to 'On'. This will reduce the amount of data the app uses, especially over cellular networks.

No, you can play music in order or on repeat as well. Simply tap the 'Shuffle' button to toggle shuffle mode off or select the playlist options to change the playback mode.

Podcasts can be found under the 'Browse' or 'Search' tabs. You can also follow your favorite podcasts to get updates when new episodes are released.

If you have any additional questions, feel free to reach out to our support team for assistance.

Ready? Let’s play.
